title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Strengthening Self-Directed Learning in Problem-Based Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Social Studies Education Experience and Understanding of PBL (Project-Based Learning) Approaches
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously complete a social studies lesson design project by utilizing the CAL module according to the PBL scenario
Achieve over 85% effectiveness in CAL learning content by applying Gagné’s Nine Events of Instruction
Demonstrate a 30% or greater improvement in scores from pre- to post-SDL questionnaire assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
